text: The 2021–22 Los Angeles Lakers season was the 75th season of the team. It was the 74th season in the National Basketball Association (NBA). ==References== ==Other websites== * 2021–22 Los Angeles Lakers at Basketball-Reference.com Category:2021 in California Category:2022 in California Category:2021 in American sports Category:2022 in American sports
title: 2021–22 Los Angeles Lakers season
